name: Spacey Vaders
description:
A lone hero makes it to the edge of space to face down a horde of alien invaders.
With the odds stacked against him, things go wacky very quickly. 

Use the mouse to move and fire your way through alien hordes... that is until you can control the invasion force. It seems inversion of controls happens in the extreme space continuum. You will need your wits about you to destroy the "bad guys and rack up a massive high score.

Created for Godot Wild Jam #39. Theme: "Inversion
